faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: What is the cost of courses?
faq.answer1: The cost of courses varies from 250,000 to 2,000,000 sum depending on the chosen language, duration of study and level of difficulty.
faq.question2: What is the format of training?
faq.answer2: We offer both online and offline training formats. Online classes are conducted via Zoom or other video conferencing platforms.
faq.answer3: If you decide to stop studying during the first week, we will refund you the full cost of the course. After the first week, no refund is made.
faq.question4: What platforms are used for training?
faq.answer4: For online learning, we use Zoom, Google Meet and our own educational platform with interactive materials.
